metadata.title: CVE-2018-3774 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Incorrect parsing in url-parse <1.4.3 returns wrong hostname which leads tomultiple vulnerabilities such as SSRF, Open Redirect, Bypass AuthenticationProtocol.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-3774` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1').
